problem_text_cn: 如图,直线a∥b∥c,直线l1,l2与这三条平行线分别交于点A、B、C和点D、E、F,若AB:AC=1:3,DE=3,则EF的长为()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, the straight line a ∥ b ∥ c, the straight line lN_0, lN_1 and the three parallel lines intersect at points A, B, C and points D, E, F respectively, if AB: AC = N_2, DE = N_3, then the length of EF is ()
raw_comment: 本题主要考查平行线分线段成比例的性质,掌握平行线分线段可得对应线段成比例是解题的关键．
